CLASS.name: BETA-2 MIMETICS or BETA2 ADRENERGIC AGONISTS

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: In cases of obstetrical surgery, increased uterine inertia with risk of hemorrhage; furthermore serious ventricular arrhythmias, due to increase of the cardiac reactivity
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Interrupt treatment with the beta-2 agonist if the anesthesia must be done with halothane

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Serious ventricular arrhythmias due to increase of cardiac sensitization
